thread.title: No. 1 Perry Hall boys looking for first Baltimore County basketball crown
thread.title_full: No. 1 Perry Hall boys looking for first Baltimore County basketball crown

author: Glenn Graham
title: No. 1 Perry Hall boys looking for first Baltimore County basketball crown
text:
Laquill Hardnett and Anthony Higgs, the dynamite frontcourt combination of the Perry Hall boys basketball team, are at it again. The juniors consider themselves to be like brothers, so the constant bickering is no surprise. (Glenn Graham) 
Panageotou added protecting the glass -- Milford Mill outrebounded the Gators by one in the first meeting -- and containing Obasi will be priorities in coming away with a win tonight. 
The rise to No. 1 in the metro area has brought much more support to the Gators program and Panageotou expects a big crowd at Towson tonight. 
"It's great for the recognition of the program and obviously the kids are proud," he said. "Just to have the recognition of a No. 1 team in the metro area is huge for Perry Hall."
